favourite.article: Dan from Muncie, IN. A song of deep truth. Bless all here in Jesus' Name!
A great song that awakes the soul.
Soon after awakening today, the Holy Spirit brought this to my mind. A hymn from younger days. confirming His grace in giving me Ps 100 last night.. God's Grace, fresh in the new day!
Amen! This is the day that the Lord has made; I will rejoice for He has made me glad! I have no excuse to frown! I have found joy in Jesus!
Lord I thank You for making me glad!!

I will choose to enter through Your gates with thanksgiving for all You do by Your mighty hand. And... I shall enter into Your courts, Your Holy Presence, through praising You for WHO You are, The God of All Creation, The Most Righteous Judge of the Universe, The Great I Am, and my Abba (Daddy).

I enter into His gates with thanksgiving knowing what He has done for me. I enter into His inner court with praise and adoration knowing that He is capable and will take care of all my needs. I am rejoicing because He has indeed made me glad.
Praise be the Lord almighty.
